metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19149 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
Poppler before 0.70.0 has a NULL pointer dereference in _poppler_attachment_new when called from poppler_annot_file_attachment_get_attachment.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19149` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.24.5-2ubuntu4.13
libpoppler-cpp0 - 0.24.5-2ubuntu4.13
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.24.5-2ubuntu4.13
libpoppler-qt4-4 - 0.24.5-2ubuntu4.13
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.24.5-2ubuntu4.13
libpoppler44 - 0.24.5-2ubuntu4.13
poppler-utils - 0.24.5-2ubuntu4.13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.24.5-2ubuntu4.13').
